name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation.

reviews.name: John Doe
reviews.comment: Excellent sound quality and battery life!

reviews.name: Jane Smith
reviews.comment: Very comfortable, but a bit pricey.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: High-performance gaming laptop with 16GB RAM and RTX 3070 GPU.

reviews.name: Alice Green
reviews.comment: Best laptop for gaming! Smooth performance and great build quality.

reviews.name: Michael Brown
reviews.comment: Amazing specs, but a bit heavy.

name: Smartphone X
description: Latest smartphone with a 6.5-inch display, 5G support, and a 108MP camera.

reviews.name: David Lee
reviews.comment: Super fast and the camera quality is unbelievable.

reviews.name: Emma White
reviews.comment: Battery life could be better, but overall a fantastic phone.

name: Wireless Earbuds Pro
description: Noise-canceling wireless earbuds with 24-hour battery life.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.comment: Comfortable fit and excellent sound quality!

reviews.name: Liam Martin
reviews.comment: Great earbuds, but the charging case could be more durable.

name: Ultra Running Shoes
description: Lightweight and comfortable running shoes designed for long-distance running.

reviews.name: Noah Miller
reviews.comment: Super comfortable and great for running marathons.

reviews.name: Sophia Garcia
reviews.comment: Great shoes, but the sizing runs a bit small.
